activities: MCR is part of a family of organizations under the umbrella of Medpace, Inc., which is a full service clinical research organization.  MCR contracts with sites and investigators around the world in connection with clinical trials.  MCR may process personal data of the investigators and their staff, and third parties involved in clinical research, who provide services to MCR. The personal data may be disclosed to Medpace, Inc. for the purpose of the mission, which is to accelerate the global development of safe and effective medical therapeutics.
personaldata: On-line, off-line, manually and electronically processed data, clinical trial data and customer data
recoursemech: Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
